title: Top End Wedding
creator_credit: Joshua Tyler, Amy Baker, Heather Wallace, Miranda Tapsell, Screen Australia, Wayne Blair, Rosemary Blight, Kate Croser, Goalpost Pictures and Kylie du Fresne
brief_description: Lauren and Ned are engaged, they are in love, and they have just ten days to find Lauren’s mother who has gone AWOL somewhere in the remote far north of Australia, reunite her parents and pull off their dream wedding.

constellations_other.name: Rachel Perkins
constellations_other.description: The moving image has helped tell First Peoples stories through documentary, films and TV shows, with acclaimed director, producer and screenwriter Rachel Perkins contributing significantly to these stories.

creator_credit_for_label: Joshua Tyler, Amy Baker, Heather Wallace, Miranda Tapsell, Screen Australia, Wayne Blair, Rosemary Blight, Kate Croser, Goalpost Pictures and Kylie du Fresne
description: Lauren and Ned are engaged, they are in love, and they have just ten days to find Lauren’s mother who has gone AWOL somewhere in the remote far north of Australia, reunite her parents and pull off their dream wedding.
